articles.content: Russian operations make up only 3 percent of McDonalds operating income but 9 percent of its revenue. Likewise, Russia accounts for $3.4 billion, or 4 percent, of PepsiCos annual revenue of $79.4 bil… [+1570 chars]

articles.author: Kala Vijayraghavan
articles.title: Tata Sons set to announce a new CEO for Air India soon - Economic Times
articles.description: The appointment of the groups first choice had hit turbulent weather over government approvals and security clearances. Egon Zhender, Tata groups headhunter had shortlisted a couple of candidates for the CEO post including that of Ilker Ayci.
articles.content: Tata Sons will soon announce a new CEO for Air India to replace Turkish expat Ilker Ayci who resigned before taking charge next month in the wake of controversies regarding his appointment. The holdi… [+1929 chars]

articles.author: Yogima Seth Sharma
articles.title: EPFO seeks to transfer ₹100 crore of unclaimed deposits to elders' fund - Economic Times
articles.description: The proposal will be taken up for consideration by the central board of trustees of EPFO at its upcoming meeting on Saturday, people familiar with the development told ET.
articles.content: The Employees' Provident Fund Organisation (EPFO) has moved a proposal to transfer 100 crore from its unclaimed funds, in excess of 58,000 crore, to the Senior Citizens' Welfare Fund, in line with a … [+1481 chars]

articles.title: No Smartphone required for UPI Payments, 24x7 Helpline: RBI upgrades UPI Payment Systems - taxscan.in
